job description:
Job Description
Immediate need for a talented Senior Data Architect with experience in the Banking and Financial Industry.This is a 06+ Months contract opportunity with long-term potential and is located in Plano, TX. Please review the job description below.

Job ID: 18-29696

Key Responsibilities:
  • Build products that better connect data analysts, business analysts, and data scientists and enable them to focus more time on analysis and less and pulling and manipulating data
  • Interact regularly with associates in our marketing and analytics group to understand their biggest painpoints and develop ideas to address them
  • Develop full-stack applications with a focus on backend micro services and open source technologies using docker, AWS, and Python
  • Architect and implement highly scalable, high performing distributed applications using Python
  • Build new MicroServices/APIs in Python
  • Work with product owners to understand desired application capabilities and testing scenarios
  • Work with a high-performing agile team to design, develop, test, implement, and support technical solutions across a full-stack of development tools and technologies
  • Work directly with existing open source projects, such as Jupyter and Airflow and actively participate in those communities
  • Build cutting edge tools that are unique and build up your patent portfolio
  • Provide technical leadership in terms of architecting applications, mentoring developers, making smart technology decisions, etc.
  • Evaluate new technologies and stays current on industry best practices
  • Leverage designated innovation time to work on your passion project that will help , take the next step in technology!
Key Responsibilities and Technology Experience:
  • Bachelors Degree or military experience
  • At least 4 years of experience designing, developing and delivering cloud native applications
  • At least 2 years of experience developing, deploying, and connecting RESTful services
  • At least 2 years of experience using AWS or other cloud provider
  • At least 2 years of Python in a software engineering environment
  • At least 4 years of Python in a software engineering environment
  • At least 2 years of demonstrated experience developing or contributing to open source projects
  • At least 2 years of experience with Jupyter or Airflow
  • At least 1 year of experience with SQL
  • Experience deploying to ECS or Kubernetes
  • Quick learning and excellent problem solving
  • Understanding of basic Networking and databases
Our client is a leading Banking and Financial Industry and we are currently interviewing to fill this and other similar contract positions. If you are interested in this position, please apply online for immediate consideration.
